summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5851 for the improvement of Queen Anne Avenue, from Harrison Street to West Roy Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 77163, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
